body: 多谢！大神！

补充：
在flink job运行的时候，mysql中的数据变化，不会同步到doris中；
在flink job进行取消后，mysql中的数据变化，才会同步到doris中。  

猜想应该是取消的时候，同步的。

> _No description provided._

请问你是怎么解决得，我这边也不能消费到kafka数据，一直报task job failed
There will be a new PR for this.
If you want to use real-time effects, you can set the **sink.batch.size =1**  ，default value is 100
多谢大神
I have a lot of similar logs in the new version 0.14. Is there any solution

我发现，通过
```
SHOW PROC "/cluster_balance/pending_tablets";
```
命令可以查到有两个均衡任务正在进行，应该是这里的原因。我通过
```
ADMIN SET FRONTEND CONFIG ("disable_balance" = "true");
```
临时禁止了均衡操作，alter任务执行成功。

可是为什么均衡任务会这么慢呢？
我遇到和你一样的问题，想问下解决了吗
推荐使用docker 编译镜像，那个不需要下载和编译第三方库。如果有需要，可以先尝试在 vars.sh 里修改对应的下载连接
Still not fixed
That is weird. Seems that the doc didn't pushed to the website, I will check it later.
您好，我用的0.13版本，跟你遇到了同样的问题，我在FE中添加了`enable_http_server_v2 = true`，已经可以通过FlinkSQL查询Doris数据库，并且成功提交insert任务，但是并没有数据写入doris表，查看任务也没有报错，请问您知道是怎么回事吗？

maybe uneven data distribution.
`show tablet from xxx`, check the row count in each tablet is samilar or diff very much

2.Since write to doris is based on streamload, if your table is a UNIQUE model, it will automatically update based on the sequence of data

1. Recurring problems
See [issue-5777](https://github.com/apache/incubator-doris/issues/5777) step 4

2. Compiling and unit tests with stuck job
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/36130371/117569611-11635580-b0f9-11eb-9682-d8fbff20c8cf.png)
job 17006 unexpired is stuck at 99% progress 
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/36130371/117569900-710e3080-b0fa-11eb-8cc3-ad2002d8b157.png)
job 17006 expired is canceled by my code

When I encountered this problem at that time, I found that the subsequent submitted tasks were most likely always in the state of Exporting process 0. The stuck task is full of export_exporting_job threads, and it is difficult for subsequent submitted tasks to compete for resources of executors for exporting tasks

> The default `agent_task_trace_threshold_sec` is only 2 seconds,
> which may lead to a lot of tracing dump log.
> 
> Maybe we can modify the default value to a large number.

`agent_task_trace_threshold_sec` is modified to 86400 seconds (one day). Anyone who wants to open trace feathure, just config it lower.

> Is the network connected?

我怀疑，我本机访问了：10.152.0.205:8040这个地址；但是，为什么？我只是从本机调用一个url（外网地址）导入数据而已。

OLAP_SCAN_NODE (id=0):(Active: 25s957ms, % non-child: 99.35%)
- BitmapIndexFilterTimer: 2.801us
- BlockConvertTime: 881.529ms
- BlockFetchTime: 23s56ms
- BlockLoadTime: 22s172ms

存在一个慢节点，这个scan node明显比其他scan node耗时长。看数据基本上分布还算均匀。根据我们的经验，一般是scan的线程池满了，scan 任务等待了很久才执行

请问，tcmalloc占用这么高，一般是什么问题导致的，线上集群不太好profile，如何进一步定位？

38T is the memory requested by tcmalloc but not the memory actually used.
BTW, have you enabled swap?
top -Hp pid观察下发生OOM时那些线程在工作，我们最近升级到0.13版本，发生了频繁OOM，大部分原因是compaction导致的，通过调参抑制base compaction and cumulative compaction得到缓解。

> BTW, have you enabled swap?
disable swap
The UT is not your problem, it has been fixed.
you are right. also you can check on this: http://doris.apache.org/master/zh-CN/administrator-guide/running-profile.html#profile%E5%8F%82%E6%95%B0%E8%A7%A3%E6%9E%90

Hi，关于多机房部署方面，doris是否有新的计划或者进展呢，我们这边对多机房有需求场景。

> Hi，关于多机房部署方面，doris是否有新的计划或者进展呢，我们这边对多机房有需求场景。

是否可以简单描述下你的多机房部署需求？

CREATE ROUTINE LOAD example_db.test1 ON example_tbl
        COLUMNS(category, author, price, timestamp, dt=from_unixtime(timestamp, '%Y%m%d'))
        PROPERTIES
        (
            "desired_concurrent_number"="3",
            "max_batch_interval" = "20",
            "max_batch_rows" = "300000",
            "max_batch_size" = "209715200",
            "strict_mode" = "false",
            "format" = "json",
            "jsonpaths" = "[\"$.category\",\"$.author\",\"$.price\",\"$.timestamp\"]",
            "strip_outer_array" = "true",
            "json_root" = "$.RECORDS"
        )
        FROM KAFKA
        (
            "kafka_broker_list" = "broker1:9092,broker2:9092,broker3:9092",
            "kafka_topic" = "my_topic",
            "kafka_partitions" = "0,1,2",
            "kafka_offsets" = "0,0,0"
        );

能否给下对应的语义示例  文档上没有看到

你 121.41.219.202 这是个公网IP，本机网卡上没有吧，用你的内网IP 10.152.0.205
doris有在阿里云服务器上部署的文章吗？

How is your SSD disk mounted, and how is the name of the doris storage directory named?
The directory names of your configured doris storage directories hdd and ssd should be similar to doris.SSD, doris.HDD

storage_root_path = /hdd_data05/doris.HDD;/ssd_data03/doris.SSD;/hdd_data08/doris.HDD;/hdd_data02/doris.HDD;/hdd_data04/doris.HDD;/hdd_data01/doris.HDD;/hdd_data10/doris.HDD; ;/ssd_data02/doris.SSD;/hdd_data09/doris.HDD;/hdd_data06/doris.HDD;/hdd_data03/doris.HDD;/ssd_data01/doris.SSD;/hdd_data07/doris.HDD;/ssd_data04/doris.SSD

This is your configuration problem, not a bug
run-be-ut.sh also need this modify

Yes, I've modified it too.

My configuration is:

> My configuration is:
> storage_root_path = /data01/doris.SSD,2000;/data02/doris.SSD,2000;/data03/doris.SSD,2000;/data04/doris.SSD,2000

This is a issue. Currently, dynamic partition does not consider the `storage_medium` property, this should be fixed later.
Got it. I have read the code, in the analyzeDataProperty method, the properties not contain storage_medium . For now I create partition manually.

rpc traffic timeout caused by network latency
Later I will fix other uninitialised value BUG

g++ OOM 被操作系统kill了，你可以把并行编译参数改小一些
build.sh 里面的 `PARALLEL=$[$(nproc)/4+1] ` 改小一点 
eg:
```
PARALLEL=4
```

这个是explain

> Usage:
http://localshot:8040/metrics?type=aggregate&entity_type=tablet&metric_name=query_scan_bytes&aggregate_label=table_id

If I want to collect all the 5 metrics, I have to request 5 times?

> > Usage:
> > http://localshot:8040/metrics?type=aggregate&entity_type=tablet&metric_name=query_scan_bytes&aggregate_label=table_id
> 
> If I want to collect all the 5 metrics, I have to request 5 times?

Yes, this http interface supports to aggregate the label of one metric, not the metric self.

> > > Usage:
> > > http://localshot:8040/metrics?type=aggregate&entity_type=tablet&metric_name=query_scan_bytes&aggregate_label=table_id
> > 
> > 
> > If I want to collect all the 5 metrics, I have to request 5 times?
> 
> Yes, this http interface supports to aggregate the label of one metric, not the metric self.

Why not aggreate all metrics whose entity is type of 'entity_type' and contains 'aggregate_label', it would be more general.

By the way,  unless it is a very small pr, there should be an issue to describe it ~
不支持呢，亲

@morningman ,其实我们这边核心的需求是如何应对idc搬迁时doris平滑切换的问题。目前doris看文档是支持最小分区粒度的全量复制，idc搬迁时候主备场景下需要写入层做一个缓冲层，重新导入中间缺失的数据。我们这边把doris作为服务平台使用，切换过程就需要用户配合的比较多。目前希望doris能给出个类似mysql binlog同步增量的方案或者能直接在多idc部署中支持这种需求就更好了。
